NewsArticle.Title: 25% Bonus Kruna for June
NewsArticle.Content: 25% Bonus Kruna for June All Kruna Coupons purchased within the month of June will be given an additional 25% bonus! You will get the following amounts: $9.95 Kruna Coupon = 1250 Kruna $29.95 Kruna Coupon = 4125 Kruna This bonus deal will only last for the month of June, so buy your kruna now! *If you have already purchased and redeemed a coupon prior to this announcement you should have already received your bonus. *Any coupons purchased in the month of June can be redeemed anytime (beyond June) and will still receive the bonus.
